creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. Peter Deitsch
text: Manfred Ebster was born in Vorarlberg, Austria, in 1941. In 1960, at the age of 19, he moved to Vienna to study graphic art at the Academy of Applied Arts where he worked on various glass window projects. After extended stays in Sweden, France, and the United States, he eventually returned to Vienna working as a freelance artist until his death in 2012.
title: Toad Hill
